Generation V.Black: The temperature of their breath is -58° F . They create snow crystals and make snow fall in the areas around them.
Generation V.White: This Pokémon formed from icicles bathed in energy from the morning sun. It sleeps buried in snow.
Generation V.Black 2: Theoretically, this Pokémon formed from icicles bathed in energy from the morning sun. Their breath is -58° F .
Generation V.White 2: Theoretically, this Pokémon formed from icicles bathed in energy from the morning sun. Their breath is -58° F .

Generation VI.X: The temperature of their breath is -58 degrees Fahrenheit . They create snow crystals and make snow fall in the areas around them.
Generation VI.Y: This Pokémon formed from icicles bathed in energy from the morning sun. It sleeps buried in snow.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: The temperature of their breath is -58 degrees Fahrenheit . They create snow crystals and make snow fall in the areas around them.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: This Pokémon formed from icicles bathed in energy from the morning sun. It sleeps buried in snow.

Generation VII.Sun: Born of an icicle, this Pokémon uses its frosty breath to make ice crystals, causing snow to fall.
Generation VII.Moon: It feels pleasantly cool when embraced. This Pokémon is treasured by households in warm regions.
Generation VII.Ultra Sun: It exhales cold air that is at –58 degrees Fahrenheit . When it's in a warm place, it shrinks little by little.
Generation VII.Ultra Moon: When the morning sun hit an icicle, it wished not to melt, and thus Vanillite was born. At night, it buries itself in snow to sleep.

Generation VIII.Sword: Unable to survive in hot areas, it makes itself comfortable by breathing out air cold enough to cause snow. It burrows into the snow to sleep.
Generation VIII.Shield: Supposedly, this Pokémon was born from an icicle. It spews out freezing air at −58 degrees Fahrenheit to make itself more comfortable.

Generation V.Black: Cold Storage Route 6 , Dragonspiral Tower Winter
Generation V.White: Cold Storage Route 6 , Dragonspiral Tower Winter

Generation VII.Moon: Tapu Village ( SOS Battle while hailing )
Generation VII.Ultra Sun: Tapu Village , Mount Lanakila ( SOS Battle while hailing )
Generation VII.Ultra Moon: Tapu Village , Mount Lanakila ( SOS Battle while hailing )
